  • Method Details

    • addNewBooking

      public void addNewBooking(Booking newBooking)
      Appends newBooking to ArrayList of current bookings. Displays a message of a successful booking.
      Parameters:
      newBooking - this BookingManager's newBooking.

    • getBookingsOfCustomer

      public ArrayList<Booking> getBookingsOfCustomer(CustomerAccount owner)
      Searches for a customers booking with given owner. Iterates through ArrayList of bookings and finds an entry corresponding to the given owner.
      Parameters:
      owner - This BookingManager's owner.
      Returns:
      this owner's customerBookings.

    • getBookings

      public ArrayList<Booking> getBookings()
      Gets an ArrayList of Booking.
      Returns:
      this BookingManager's bookings.

    • sortByValue

      public static LinkedHashMap<String,Float> sortByValue(LinkedHashMap<String,Float> hm)
      Returns movies sorted by sales, same as SortByValue Sorting class.
      Returns:
      Linked HashMap of sorted movies by value.

    • sortMoviesBySales

      public LinkedHashMap<String,Float> sortMoviesBySales()
      Returns movies sorted by sales, same as SortBySales Sorting class.
      Returns:
      Linked HashMap of sorted movies by sales.
